message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $85 for it right now.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $105?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit high for me.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us. How about $95?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $100?
